## Page / File
Specify which documentation file(s) or section(s) require updates.  
Examples:  
- README.md  
- Architecture.md  
- Feature-based folder structure guide  
- Setup instructions (Xcode, SPM packages, etc.)  
- API documentation

## Proposed Change
Describe clearly what should change (before → after) and why it’s needed.  
Examples:  
- Outdated instructions  
- Incorrect architecture diagrams  
- Missing explanation for a Clean Architecture layer  
- Clarifying SwiftUI navigation or MVVM responsibilities

## Reason / Motivation
Explain why this change improves the documentation or developer experience.

## Related Links
Add PRs, design documents, or external references if applicable.
